title: The Total Package! Balcony, dishwasher, full amenities!
posting_body: Call Apartment Guys at 773-549-3474 and ask for Reference #128732.
Large Gold Coast Rehabbed One Bedroom with a Balcony!
Amazing views from your floor to ceiling windows and private balcony!
Ideal location right on the Gold Coast and River North border!
this unit also has great closet space, central air conditioning, and newer kitchen with a dishwasher.
Located in a full amenity high-rise building with a sundeck, fitness center, business center, on-site grocery store, dry cleaners, and a salon!
Walking distance to great Gold Coast restaurants, shopping, entertainment, and much more!
Small cats and dogs are okay.
Prices are subject to change.***Photos may be of a similar unit.***For faster response best to call or text 773-549-3474 with reference #128732
